mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PRODUCE_ORDER_APS ( ID, VOUCHER_NO, INSIDE_ORDER, ORDER_DATE, ORG_ID, DELETED, COMPANY_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_BY ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insideOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
SELECT SEQ_PRODUCE_ORDER_APS.nextval as id FROM dual
mapper.update:
UPDATE PRODUCE_ORDER_APS
VOUCHER_NO = #{voucherNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSIDE_ORDER = #{insideOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMPANY_ID = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_BY = #{modifyBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
